availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob E. Lett (Kenton county, Kentucky, master carpenter.)

body.p: Kenton county, Kentucky, master carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Lett. Father of John Lett, William Lett, John Lett, and Kate Lett. Master Carpenter in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 634.
U.S. City Directories, 1822-1995 "Covington, Kentucky, City Directory, 1878" p. 293.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 3, p. 24A.
